1370: Lammekin moved to Bloemendaelse straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Myrthel at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Myrthel, Salomon, at age 22.
1373: Had a son with Myrthel, Herdradus, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Myrthel, Veder, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Clara, at age 29.
1379: Had a son with Myrthel, Bartrarde, at age 30.
1380: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Wijfgode, at age 31.
1384: Lost his wife Myrthel while she was giving birth to Folcard in 1384.
1387: Lost son Salomon when Salomon was 17 years old.
